% Custom commands (from originals)
\newcommand{\resumeItem}[2]{\item{\textbf{#1}{\hspace{0.5mm}#2 \vspace{-0.5mm}}}}
\newcommand{\resumePOR}[3]{\vspace{0.5mm}\item\begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}[t]{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}\textbf{#1}\hspace{0.3mm}#2 & \textit{\small{#3}}\end{tabular*}\vspace{-2mm}}
\newcommand{\resumeSubheading}[4]{\vspace{0.5mm}\item\begin{tabular*}{0.98\textwidth}[t]{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}\textbf{#1} & \textit{\footnotesize{#4}} \\\textit{\footnotesize{#3}} &  \footnotesize{#2}\\\end{tabular*}\vspace{-2.4mm}}
\newcommand{\resumeProject}[4]{\vspace{0.5mm}\item\begin{tabular*}{0.98\textwidth}[t]{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}\textbf{#1} & \textit{\footnotesize{#3}} \\\footnotesize{\textit{#2}} & \footnotesize{#4}\end{tabular*}\vspace{-2.4mm}}
\newcommand{\resumeSubItem}[2]{\resumeItem{#1}{#2}\vspace{-4pt}}
\renewcommand{\labelitemi}{$\vcenter{\hbox{\tiny$\bullet$}}$}
\newcommand{\resumeSubHeadingListStart}{\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=*,labelsep=0mm]}
\newcommand{\resumeHeadingSkillStart}{\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=*,itemsep=1.4mm, rightmargin=2ex]}
\newcommand{\resumeItemListStart}{\begin{justify}\begin{itemize}[label=\textcolor{black}{--}, leftmargin=3ex, rightmargin=2ex, noitemsep,labelsep=1.2mm,itemsep=0mm]\small}
\newcommand{\resumeSubHeadingListEnd}{\end{itemize}\vspace{2mm}}
\newcommand{\resumeHeadingSkillEnd}{\end{itemize}\vspace{-2mm}}
\newcommand{\resumeItemListEnd}{\end{itemize}\end{justify}\vspace{-2mm}}
\newcommand{\cvsection}[1]{\vspace{2mm}\textbf{\large #1}\vspace{-3mm}}

% Personal + Hardware Projects (union, preserving wording)
\section{\textbf{Projects}}
  \resumeSubHeadingListStart
    % Edge AI Drone System (hardware resume)
  \resumeProject{Edge AI Drone Object Detection \& Mapping System}{Drone-based object detection system with real-time GPS mapping for park rangers.}{}{}
      \resumeItemListStart
        \item {Benchmarked \textbf{edge AI} inference on a \textbf{Hailo 8L accelerator} using \textbf{YOLOv8s}; increased small-object detection performance by >\textbf{250\%} via tiled 4K segmentation.}
        \vspace{1mm}
        \item {Integrated \textbf{UART} and \textbf{SPI} between Raspberry Pi 5, \textbf{Quectel L76K GPS}, and \textbf{SX1262 LoRa} to transmit real-time telemetry upon detections.}
        \vspace{1mm}
        \item {Source: \href{https://github.com/TAILS-Capstone}{\faGithub\ https://github.com/TAILS-Capstone}}
      \resumeItemListEnd
      \vspace{-2mm}
    % FreddyyBot Chess Engine (software + hardware variant; merged bullets)
    \resumeProject{FreddyyBot Chess Engine}{A chess engine designed from scratch in C++.}{}{}
      \resumeItemListStart
        \item {Custom move generation + evaluation enabling \textbf{~300,000 nodes/sec} position tree traversal.}
        \vspace{1mm}
        \item {Self-hosted on \textbf{Raspberry Pi 5}; integrated with \textbf{Lichess Bot API} for 24/7 play reaching \textbf{1900 Elo} (bullet).}
        \vspace{1mm}
        \item {Source: \href{https://github.com/FreddyyAndrews/FreddyyBot}{\faGithub\ github.com/FreddyyAndrews/FreddyyBot}}
        \item {Challenge the bot: \href{https://lichess.org/@/FreddyyBot}{\faChessKnight\ lichess.org/@/FreddyyBot}}
      \resumeItemListEnd
      \vspace{-2mm}
    % Sweatris
  \resumeProject{Sweatris | uOttaHack 7 Challenge Winner \& 3rd Overall}{Interactive webcam-controlled Tetris-style fitness game.}{}{}
      \resumeItemListStart
        \item {Used \textbf{OpenCV} + \textbf{YOLO} to map player position to game controls at 15 FPS for a responsive experience.}
        \vspace{1mm}
        \item {Source: \href{https://github.com/bravesirrobin358/Sweatris}{\faGithub\ github.com/bravesirrobin358/Sweatris}}
      \resumeItemListEnd
      \vspace{-2mm}
    % NBA MVP Predictor
    \resumeProject{NBA MVP Predictor}{Linear regression model predicting NBA MVP vote share.}{}{}
      \resumeItemListStart
        \item {Built \textbf{scikit-learn} regression predicting \textbf{12/13} MVPs (2010-2023), $R^2=0.56$; predicted \textbf{2024 MVP Nikola Jokic}.}
        \vspace{1mm}
        \item {Source: \href{https://github.com/FreddyyAndrews/NBA-MVP-Predictor}{\faGithub\ github.com/FreddyyAndrews/NBA-MVP-Predictor}}
